meanings.sent1: The scenical painting captured the beauty of the landscape.

meanings.definition: Providing a view of natural scenery.
meanings.sent1: The hotel room had a scenical balcony overlooking the ocean.
meanings.sent2: We took a scenic drive along the coast to enjoy the scenical route.
meanings.sent3: The scenical postcard reminded me of our peaceful vacation.
meanings.sent4: His words painted a scenical picture of the sunset on the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The scenical beauty of the waterfall took our breath away.

meanings.sent1: The hike led us to a stunning scenical with panoramic views.
meanings.sent2: She loved to paint different scenicals she discovered during her travels.
meanings.sent3: The family picnic spot by the lake was their favorite scenical.
meanings.sent4: The movie was filmed in a famous scenical known for its picturesque landscapes.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the national park was a dream come true with its breathtaking scenicals.
